title: Was there ever a full DeLorean typeface to fill out its bizarre logotype?
content:
Anyone know if a full typeface exists for the DeLorean logotype here? I never realized until this weekend how much character it has. It makes me feel like I'm eating hard candy in the 70s.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014193804im_/http:/typophile.com/files/DeLorean_4304.jpeg)
author: mgottschalk
